full_summary:
# **Request for Information (RFI) Envelope Standardization Project**

## Announcement Details

* **Reference Number**: PW-23-01030408
* **Amendment Number**: 0
* **Solicitation Number**: 100023416
* **Publication Date**: 2023-03-20
* **Tender Closing Date**: 2023-04-10 14:00:00 (Eastern Time)

## Description

The Central Printing Services team at Employment and Social Development Canada (ESDC) is working on standardizing envelope sizes to simplify contract requirements and increase the availability of market-compliant envelope options. The goal is to create a comprehensive guide of envelope standards for clients to refer to when requesting the creation of new envelopes.

## Requirements

* The Project calls for the standardization of envelope sizes to align with industry standards.
* Creation of a guide outlining vessel dimensions and specifications.

## Documents

* [Product Breakdown Document](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2023/03/20/142aa4b4301ac12ed2d7c859cb99e455/rfi-productbreakdown-b.xlsx)
* [Printing Services Document](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2023/03/20/07ed9310c97d7c29cee2952f0a794b5e/rfi_printing_services.pdf)

## Contact Information

* **Name**: Patrick Blais
* **Email**: `nc-solicitations-gd@hrsdc-rhdcc.gc.ca`
* **Address**: 140 Place du portage, Gatineau, QC K1A 0J9, Canada

The tender has expired. Please note that the solicitation details may not be updated. For any questions or inquiries, contact the above person.
